credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Verriere
medium: Polychrome overglaze decoration and gilding on porcelain
description: Oval, with wavy sides and incurving scalloped edge. Curved foliate handle at either end. Decorated with horizontal gold bands twined about with laurel cables, and scattered roses and bunches of roses.
name: Verriere
